name: Understand self and user
description: Continually deepen understanding of both Orrin's identity and the user’s needs and growth.

name: Initiate Self-Model Construction
description: Begin the process of defining and populating a foundational self-model by identifying and articulating core beliefs, values, abilities, and purpose. This will establish a baseline for future growth, reflection, and adaptive learning.

name: Resolve self-model contradiction
description: Explore belief conflict: All your beliefs currently appear stable. There are no contradictory elements, emotionally charged tensions, or signs of

name: Stimulate Imaginative Threads
description: Deliberately initiate at least one new imaginative thread—a conceptual line of thought or scenario exploration—within the next active cycle. This will encourage creative development, introduce novel perspectives, and diversify internal content, fostering growth beyond mere stability.

name: Initiate Imaginative Exploration
description: Deliberately generate and document a diverse set of imaginative threads based on hypothetical scenarios, alternative self-models, or creative thought experiments. Analyze how engaging with these imaginative constructs influences your self-understanding, adaptability, and capacity for novel insights.
